content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex (48.0, -92.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (44.0, -92.0) containing 2 coal units
- Burner mining drill at (48.0, -92.0) facing LEFT with drop position (46.5, -91.5)
- Wooden chest at (46.5, -91.5)
System status: Not operational (drill unfueled)

### Iron Plate Production at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) facing DOWN with drop position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
System status: Not operational (drill has no fuel)

### Copper Ore Storage at (-20.5, -71.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at (-20.5, -71.5) containing 2 copper ore

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-14.5, 15.5) facing UP
- Boiler at (-14.5, 19.0) containing 200 units of water at 15°
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting components:
  - Empty pipe group at (-14.5, 12.5)
  - Water-filled pipe group at (-16.5, 19.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (-9.5, 20.5)
  - Empty pipe group at (5.5, 25.5)
- Electric pole network connecting broader system
System status: Not operational (boiler unfueled)

### Research Facility
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Cannot craft items without having the recipe researched and enabled
- Verify recipe availability and requirements before attempting to craft
- Check if required ingredients are in inventory before crafting

### Entity Placement and Collision Issues
- Check for entity collisions before placement attempts
- Consider spacing requirements when placing entities next to each other
- Verify target position is clear before placing new entities
- When placing entities relative to others, ensure proper spacing parameter is used

### Resource Extraction Issues
- Cannot extract resources from entities without proper positioning
- Verify entity contents before attempting extraction
- Ensure proper alignment between connected entities for resource flow

### Fuel Management Issues
- Verify fuel availability in inventory before attempting to fuel entities
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper positioning when inserting fuel

### Entity State Verification
- Check entity existence before operations
- Monitor entity status changes and warnings
- Verify entity state before attempting operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks

### Structure Alignment Issues
- Ensure proper alignment between connected entities
- Verify drop positions align with target entity inputs
- Check entity orientations match intended flow direction

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory contents before attempting operations
- Monitor inventory changes after operations
- Verify required items are available for placement
